programme.title: True Crime Story: Indefensible
programme.desc: One of the most famous cases in modern history ends with a verdict that shakes the nation; questions arise over who is responsible, and what part trial consultants and the media play in the outcome.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Indefensible
programme.desc: Facing 20 years in prison for firing a warning shot, a Florida woman is denied use of a controversial legal defense; learning what went wrong, and who "stand your ground" laws are really designed for.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Indefensible
programme.desc: A Wisconsin woman goes to a hospital hoping to confirm her pregnancy and get medical help, but she instead steps into a nightmare; after being held captive for several days and denied a lawyer, she is thrown in jail.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Indefensible
programme.desc: A California woman who claims she was acting in self-defense ends up in prison for murder; while there, she finds her story is much more common than she realizes.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Indefensible
programme.desc: A senseless double murder lands a California man on death row; despite the harsh sentence, a broken system surrounding the death penalty leaves everyone feeling that justice hasn't been served.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: It was a mystery that plagued law enforcement for over years: four unidentified bodies found inside barrels in the woods; one woman searching for answers from her own troubled past sets herself on a journey to give the victims back their names.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man whose childhood was marked by tragedy learns of a relatively unknown serial killer, and finds himself thinking about unidentified victims; it isn't long before that pursuit becomes a full-time job and identifying victims an obsession.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young mother is found unresponsive in bed, and her cause of death is determined to be an accidental heroin overdose; but her family questions everything about the circumstances around her death, so they launch their own investigation.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man leaves home for the corner store, but dies on a rainy sidewalk just down the street; bystanders claim that he fell off of his bike, but his mom and sister don't buy it; they hit the streets to find answers.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young girl's life was thrown into chaos when her single mother died by a gunshot wound in their remote mountain home; the journey for the truth would be long and arduous, and it would be thirty years until justice was finally served.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: When a college student was found dead in rural Quebec, police refused to call it a murder; but years later, her brother continues his own investigation into her death; on the eve of a trip to return to the scene of the crime, tragedy strikes again.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: At North Port High School in Florida, three students die within months of each other; as the community learns more, they discover a common thread: all three students were hynotized by their principal, Dr. George Kenney, not long before they died.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: Dr. George Kenney begins to reveal his side of the story; as details emerge about the deaths and Marcus, Wesley and Brittany's parents speak out, an investigation into Kenney's hypnosis practice begins; the North Port community grows suspicious.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: The press catches wind of the story and it captures headlines worldwide; Dr. Kenney is asked to leave North Port High, and as the criminal trial heats up, the community is split on his culpability; a student comes forward with a new perspective.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: Pressure mounts against the school board to take accountability; Dr. Kenney leaves North Port for what seems like the final time; the community grapples with guilt and grief; Stephen offers an intimate look into Kenney's hypnosis practice.

programme.title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park
programme.sub-title: Part 1: Woman Down in Central Park
programme.desc: The NYPD identifies a dead girl in Central Park as Jennifer Levin; the search for her killer leads to her prep school friend Robert Chambers; Robert confesses he killed Jennifer Levin accidentally during rough sex.

programme.title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park
programme.desc: Robert confesses he killed Jennifer Levin accidentally during rough sex; his mother hires a high-profile attorney who says Jennifer was the aggressor.

programme.title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park
programme.desc: Robert's preppy persona begins to crumble; when the Church steps in to support Robert, the judge releases him on bail.

programme.title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park
programme.desc: The media jumps on the defense's strategy to make Jennifer seem fast and loose; the prosecution works to establish motive.

programme.title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park
programme.sub-title: Part 5: The Trial of the Decade
programme.desc: Both sides present their cases; jurors are mesmerized by Robert's charisma; afraid Robert has charmed them, the prosecution offers a plea deal.

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders
programme.desc: In November 1959, four members of the Clutter family are brutally murdered in their home in a small Kansas farming community.

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders
programme.desc: Kansas law enforcement survey the aftermath of the seemingly unmotivated crime, while criminals Perry Smith and Richard Hickock go on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders
programme.desc: Detailing the resulting investigation and convictions of Perry Smith and Richard Hickock, along with the ensuing media coverage.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: The town of Adel, Ga., is rocked by a brutal robbery homicide, and locals quickly point to an outsider as the killer; over 20 years later, new evidence raises the startling question if an innocent man is serving life for another man's crime.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: When a beloved chiropractor in Sauquoit, N.Y., dies suddenly under strange circumstances, investigators discover she's been murdered with a rare poison; the killer could only be someone she knew closely, and the case divides the town.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: A young woman in St. Augustine, Fla., with everything to live for is found shot to death with the gun belonging to her boyfriend, a deputy sheriff; he says it was suicide, but her family believes it was murder.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: When an immigrant couple who settled in the Tennessee town of Cookeville is executed in their sleep and their house set on fire, investigators identify a suspect with motive; in their rush to make an arrest, they may have gotten the wrong man.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: In rural Shelbyville, Ky., a body is found in the river; years go by until the police catch the killer, but some in town question if the suspect is even capable of committing the crime.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: When a 22-year-old dancer goes missing, the men of the neighboring town who frequented the club she worked at become the suspect pool; wealth and status may protect a killer; a determined police officer works the case.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: After a woman is found shot in her bathroom, officials launch a death investigation to determine if it was suicide - as her husband claimed - or murder; years later, the case remains open, and the town still has questions.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: A young single mother disappears without a trace; an investigation suggests she abandoned her children, while her family spends years proving she was murdered and finding her killers.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: A man claims he shot his daughter's estranged husband, Chirstian Griggs, in self-defense; after investigators close the case, Christian's family discovers evidence that the killing was not justified.
